(OOC: this will be my last post for a while, as Im
about to go watch Beast Wars. Can't miss that! lol)
::WindRider::
WindRider sensed that Battera felt a little uneasy and
took his arm from around her. He felt stupid because
he could be so impulsive sometimes. He sat down on the
ground, taking in the beauty all around him.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She saw his arm go around her and blushed.  She
> didn't know what to 
> do or say.   She had the same problem when Firearm
> was paying her all 
> those compliments.  She just had no experience or
> knowlage of what to 
> do in situations like this.  She just stood there
> looking out across 
> the plains, blushing.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > WindRider gazed out across the landscape."We
> will", he
> > said to Battera. "Have faith in the Matrix." With
> that
> > he reached to put his arm around her.
> 
> 
>
